arts.ttl: Tottenham ready for reunion with Man Utd's 'best player' after summer transfer
arts.sum: Manchester United and Tottenham Hotspur are due to face off in the Premier League on Saturday and one particular reunion will be at the centre of the top-flight clash

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Tottenham welcome in-form Man United to the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
arts.sum: Thomas Frank's side have struggled at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium so far this term and have only picked up just a single point from a possible 12 in their last four Premier League home outings, and that was thanks to a 94th-minute equaliser from midfielder Joao Palhinha to spare Spurs' blushes against a struggling Wolves side. Tuesday's win ensured Tottenham are one of five teams that remain unbeaten in this season's UEFA Champions League following matchday four of the group stage, along with fellow North London rivals Arsenal, last year's runners-up Inter Milan, 2020 winners Bayern Munich and 2023 winners Manchester City.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Tottenham Hotspur welcome in-form Manchester United to the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
arts.sum: Thomas Frank's side have struggled at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium so far this term and have only picked up just a single point from a possible 12 in their last four Premier League home outings, and that was thanks to a 94th-minute equaliser from midfielder Joao Palhinha to spare Spurs' blushes against a struggling Wolves side . Tottenham go into Saturday's Premier League clash with Manchester United looking for just their second home win of the season, having defeated newly promoted Burnley 3-0 on the opening day, thanks to a strike from Brennan Johnson and a Richarlison double.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend predictions - Week 11
arts.sum: There are five games taking place on Saturday and Sunday this week and Tom Hill predicts the outcome of all the matches before the next international break.

arts.ttl: Man Utd Predicted Lineup vs. Tottenham: Healthy Red Devils Limit Changes
arts.sum: Revenge is on the mind of Man Utd when they visit the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.

arts.ttl: Tottenham predicted lineup vs Man Utd: Kudus makes swift return

arts.ttl: Spurs boast ‘the longest in the division’ ahead of Manchester United clash
arts.sum: Certain games do not so much define seasons as provide invaluable barometers as to how a side is faring. For Tottenham, there's the North London Derby, Chelsea and, of course, any game against Chelsea. Manchester United at home is such a game. arts.ttl: Man Utd star Leny Yoro makes feelings clear on Tottenham revenge - 'Everyone knows'
arts.sum: Manchester United were beaten by Tottenham in the Europa League final last season and Leny Yoro says the Red Devils can look to put that result behind them this weekend

arts.ttl: Leny Yoro confident Man Utd are in a more positive place ahead of Spurs reunion
arts.sum: United face Tottenham on Saturday in their first meeting since the Europa league final.
